entities.name: house-elf liberation front
entities.description: The House-Elf Liberation Front is mentioned as the group that barricaded themselves in. (THE HOUSE-ELF LIBERATION FRONT)

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is trying to help the others and shouting instructions on how to restrain the skrewt. (Hagrid shouted as Ron and Harry used their wands...), (Rita Skeeter was leaning on Hagrid’s garden fence...)

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is trying to help Hagrid and is shouting instructions on how to restrain the skrewt. (‘Yeah, we wouldn’t want that!’ Ron shouted angrily...), (Ron and Harry backed into the wall of Ha grid’s cabin...)

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is among those who remained outside trying to help Hagrid. (Harry, Ron, and Hermi-one, however, were among those who remained outside...)

Rita Skeeter is observing the scene from Hagrid's garden fence. (Rita Skeeter was leaning on Hagrid’s garden fence, looking in at the mayhem.)
